entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • On macOS `Process.PrivateMemorySize64` returns `0` #105665
  • .NET exception call stack not present when running as WASM #105664
  • [API Proposal]: Create a ToListOrEmpty<T> on System.Collections.Generic #105660
  • Cant set brotli sliding window length #105655
  • [API Proposal]: Overload ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull #105644
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'IS_ALIGNED(addr, byteSize)' during 'Emit code' #105624
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!varTypeIsMask(tree)' during 'Linear scan register alloc' #105623
    9.0.0
  • JIT: `AdvSimd.ShiftRightLogical(x, 0)` throws in debug but not in release #105621
    9.0.0
  • JIT: [arm32] Assertion failed 'baseRegUsed == reg2' during 'Generate code' #105620
    9.0.0
  • JIT: [arm32] Assertion failed 'varDsc->IsAlwaysAliveInMemory() || ((regSet.GetMaskVars() & regMask) == 0)' during 'Generate code' #105619
    9.0.0
  • JIT: [arm32] Assertion failed 'op2->TypeIs(TYP_I_IMPL)' during 'Morph - Global' #105618
    9.0.0
  • Applications requesting download of .NET 8 runtime even when it is installed #105615
  • Wrong revision in metadata for the `System.Data.SqlClient` version 4.8.6 (NuGet) #105613
  • Test failure: System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.PfxIterationCountTests_X509Certificate2.Import_IterationCountLimitExceeded_ThrowsInAllottedTime #105609
  • Test failure: baseservices/exceptions/unittests/CollidedUnwind/CollidedUnwind.cmd #105608
  • [API Proposal]: Ability to get and set `ThreadLocal<T>.Value` in one method call #105607
    Future

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Implement IUtf8SpanParsable on Guid #105653
  • Standardize pattern for exposing advanced configuration for compression streams #42820
    9.0.0
  • Discrepancy in Windows built-in COM support between native and managed sides #56222
    9.0.0
  • Custom Marshaller codefix uses `nint` by default for unmanaged type with no indication that it should be changed #93315
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Wrong constant folding with -0.0f/-0.0d #105627
    9.0.0
  • Remove RequiresUnreferencedCode from DefaultValueAttribute #97842
    9.0.0
  • Debugger callstack failing when debugging with exceptions #105640
    9.0.0
  • IConfigureOptions should always be registered as transient #105600
    Future
  • Running .NET 6 single file binary with enabled compression on Apple M1 chip causes app to be "killed" #84066
    9.0.0
  • Receiving the following error message after upgrading to .NET SDK 6.0.200 on MacOS: Error: 'Failed to initialize CoreCLR, HRESULT: 0x80004005' [/var/folders/4d/cbxjxphj73931v78kt_h2vr80000gn/T/il11v5iq.ifv/WorkerExtensions.csproj] #66856
    6.0.x
  • [wasm][aot] Test failure in System.Drawing.Primitives test suite #83394
    9.0.0
  • W^X concerns with C++/CLI #69691
    9.0.0
  • .NET Runtime Support for Swift Interop #93631
    9.0.0
  • Add tests for MSBuild tasks in `src/tasks` #79010
    9.0.0
  • Cannot download EMSDK in mono-wasm when running on Linux aarch64 #75589
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] Review compiler options (again) #80217
    9.0.0
  • [mono] Implement new intrinsics in System/Numerics/Quaternion.cs #81961
    9.0.0
  • dotnet.timezones.blat & dotnet.timezones.blat.gz do not have the same contents on Publish (stale file in publish folder) #96033
    9.0.0
  • support for int256 integer data type; (note: extremely happy to see int128 in .net7.0 and moving forward!) #105650
  • running dotnet publish errors #100161
    9.0.0
  • [WebAssembly] AOT + WasmEnableExceptionHandling (false) - Does not start on iOS #95963
    9.0.0
  • Mono runtime fails to build for win-arm64 (and thus cross-compilers) #82496
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'node->OperIs(GT_LCL_ADDR) && lvaGetDesc(node->AsLclVarCommon())->IsHiddenBufferStructArg()' during 'Morph - Global' #105565
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] WBT `SatelliteAssembliesTests.CheckThatSatelliteAssembliesAreNotAOTed` failing #90458
    9.0.0
  • [Mono] Consider switching to C11 #90404
    9.0.0
  • [mono] ICU data file is not part of the bundle in library mode #95124
    9.0.0
  • Wasm.Build.Tests.Blazor.MiscTests.NativeBuild_WithDeployOnBuild_UsedByVS tests failing on restore for nuget package #104569
    9.0.0
  • [browser] addons.xpi ERROR System addon update list error SyntaxError: XMLHttpRequest.open: 'http://%(server)s/dummy-system-addons.xml' is not a valid URL. #104580
    9.0.0
  • Mono Wasm - System.Tests.ArrayTests.Copy_SZArray #105093
    Future
  • TrimmerRootAssembly results in incoherent trimming and hence integrity check error #96620
    9.0.0
  • [browser][mt] Jiterp Failed to patch opcode #97925
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: Interop/PInvoke/CriticalHandles/Test/Test/Test.cmd #103939
    9.0.0
  • publish a Microsoft.NET.WebAssembly.Webcil nuget to the transport feed #86597
    9.0.0
  • System.Text.Json Source Generation fails to compile when explicit property names and ignored property names collide. #99988
    10.0.0
  • System.Runtime.Loader.Tests.AssemblyLoadContextTest.Unload_CollectibleWithTwoAssemblies [FAIL] #100295
  • NetworkStream read large data string #105359
    9.0.0
  • Use CType on windows 11 #105614
  • [Perf] WASM SoD - 6% regression in dotnet.wasm.br file #57749
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Another potential bad codegen with shift by `Vector128` #105558
    9.0.0
  • Revisit code that updates loops before block removal #68844
    9.0.0
  • Test time out for Loader tests on osx arm64 in gcstress0x3 #104323
    9.0.0
  • unsigned right shift operator(>>>) cannot apply to two dynamic objects #99102
  • Private enumeration type can not be recognized when converted to dynamic #79045
  • Inconsistent CSharpCodeProvider.GenerateCodeFromCompileUnit output between net472 and net6/7/8 #95553
  • [NativeAOT] Local variables not available when debugging apps on Apple platforms #91955
    9.0.0
  • Test failure: baseservices/varargs/varargsupport/varargsupport.cmd #98911
    9.0.0
  • 18 regressions around string #97825
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 20 Regressions on 2/5/2024 1:05:09 PM #98046
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 7 Regressions on 2/25/2024 4:37:10 PM #99122
    9.0.0
  • Invalid profiler callbacks on exception handling since .NET 9 preview 3 #104300
    9.0.0
  • [browser][mt] Upgrade emscripten #75625
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix trim analysis for assignment to multiple refs in single method call #105663
    area-Tools-ILLink
  • Enable some reflection emit tests on Mono #105662
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Use correct IL offset when reporting dataflow warnings for return statements #105661
    needs-area-label
  • Ensure that embedded broadcast is correctly checking for EVEX support before use #105659
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix race condition in nongcheap.cpp test #105658
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Rename `cdac_offsets` to `cdac_data` #105657
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Delete ROUND JIT helpers that are no longer used #105656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement `IUtf8SpanParsable` on `Guid` #105654
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Don't run `fgUpdateFlowGraph` after reordering blocks if using RPO-based layout #105652
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove fallthrough constraint for `BBJ_SWITCH -> BBJ_COND` conversion #105651
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • AssemblyNameInfo.FullName should contain PublicKey #105649
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Fix flaky tests in WindowsServiceLifetimeTests #105648
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • TransferEncoding chunked testing only if it is last header value #105647
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [mono] Remove incorrect offsetof definition that shouldn't be needed #105646
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Set GCStressIncompatible on GenericContext test #105645
    GCStress
  • Update generated ILLink analyzer tests #105643
    linkable-framework, needs-area-label
  • Fix check for types interesting to dataflow #105642
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Disable more flaky FSW tests for Windows #105638
    area-System.IO, 9.0.0
  • Workaround bug in EvtFormatMessage #105636
    area-System.Diagnostics.EventLog
  • Set the initial spin count unit to 10 for DATAS. #105634
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Adjust IP after an AV during an STEP with FEATURE_EMULATE_SINGLESTEP enabled #105633
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [NRBF] Fix XML docs #105632
    documentation, area-System.Formats.Nrbf
  • [Http/SslStress] Update linux container centos-stream9 #105631
    area-System.Net.Http
  • More IR validations in HIR #105630
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove fallthrough restrictions in `Compiler::fgOptimizeBranch` #105625
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] move emsdk config file from runtime to emsdk #105612
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • Store status code in exception for ProxyTunnelError #105610
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0

Merged

  • Update suppression reason for Assembly.GetType call #105577
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • Ensure that negation of floating-point values is correctly handled #105629
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "Remove CONTEXT_XSTATE in FaultingExceptionFrame::UpdateRegDisplay" #105641
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Update Alpine version for libraries pipeline #105553
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add alternate system color experimental feature #105525
    area-System.Drawing, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add ZLib, Brotli compression options #105430
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Filter out fields of implicit byref params for retbuf optimization #105617
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [PERF] Update tool build framework version #105639
    area-Infrastructure
  • [cdac] Add GetArrayData to Object contract, partially implement ISOSDacInterface::GetObjectData #105534
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add runtime config parameter to force ijwhost to load assemblies in an isolated context #105436
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 8.0.9
  • Update stubmgr.cpp #105611
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix bug in handling of duplicate properties in the fast-path source generator. #105628
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Fix ShiftRightLogical constant folding #105571
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Suppress the special VSD callsite nop marker for NAOT x86 ABI #105604
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][interp] Attempt to interpret m2n wrapper if it is not found in aot image #105477
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.9

Updated

  • Add GC heap hard limit for 32 bit #101024
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add ee_alloc_context (NativeAOT) #104851
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Randomized allocation sampling #104955
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Bump to updated llvm 19 #105427
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [GC] Avoid OOM in large-allocation-only workloads #105521
    area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Simplified muxer fix #99576
    area-Host
  • SunOS process and thread support #105403
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-SunOS, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2505022 #105050
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Haiku: Add Haiku support for CoreCLR/PAL #93907
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution, os-haiku
  • Expose StressLog via CDAC and port StressLogAnalyzer to managed code #104999
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • Enable CertificateCallbackThrowPropagates on Alpine #105489
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Update Preview/Experimental Attributes in Intrinsics #105579
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Update runtime's DevServer to match Blazor's updates in 9 #105554
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix MaxWorkingSet_GetNotStarted_ThrowsInvalidOperationException #105424
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-freebsd, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • Error out when struct size is bigger than int.MaxValue #104393
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • Enhance the bound generator concept to remove duplicate parameters and make it more pervasive throughout the system #105597
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource] Support listening to meters out-of-proc using a wildcard #105581
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Implement ARM32 atomic intrinsics #97792
    arch-arm32, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [wasi] wasi:http + WasiHttpHandler #103752
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • [WASI] bump WASI SDK 23 #105317
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi, 9.0.0
  • Improve the performance of `BigInteger`.`{Max|Min}Magnitude`/`Abs` #105570
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • [browser] Marshalling of resolved Tasks/promises is not resolved in JS/C# #105464
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Added SVE GetFfr, SetFfr, LoadVectorFirstFaulting, GatherVectorFirstFaulting #105595
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Inline properties during importation #96325
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, Future
  • Add missing break statement #104286
    area-Debugger-mono, community-contribution
  • [wasi] Remove unused string parameter from mono_wasm_load_runtime #104608
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [browser] Remove check for user agent when attaching debugger #105559
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Issue 104700: Clarify error message for collection property with no getter #104861
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Rename module file to .mjs #105303
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-wasi, os-browser
  • [WIP] DATAS tuning fixes #105545
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix SSPI ComputeIntegrityCheck with Sign level #105605
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Pass content length into limited streams as Int64 #105481
    area-System.Net
  • [browser][wbt] Fix `InvalidOperationException: There is no currently active test` #105561
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono, os-browser
  • Use memfd_create when available #105178
    NO-MERGE, area-System.IO, blocked, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Update IncrementingPollingCounter only on Timer thread #105548
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • Automatically export '__managed__Main' when needed #105353
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add ee_alloc_context #104849
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Cleanup some code under FEATURE_STUBS_AS_IL #104731
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, 10.0.0
